    The SSBSE is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.

    SSBSE'17 will be hosted in Paderborn, Germany, September 09-11.

    The conference will be co-located with FSE'17

    Important Dates
    Feb14: Tutorial Proposals
    Feb28: Tutorials Selected

    Submission
    Mar31: Abstracts
    Apr07: Papers
    May10: Notification
    Jun07: Camera Ready

    Submission
    May21: Short Papers
    May21: Student Papers
    May25: Challenge Track
    Jun04: Notification
    Jun11: Camera Ready

    Registration
    Jun11: Author Registration
    Jul09: Early Registration

    Message from the organization team:

    We thank all SSBSE followers and attendees for making it a successful event with 26 high-quality keynotes, paper presentations, and tutorials.

    Impressions from the event can be found in our photo gallery.

    It was a pleasure for us to meet you in Paderborn and we are looking forward to seeing you again in Montpellier next year. I hand SSBSE over to Benoit Baudry, the general chair of SSBSE 2018

    Lars Grunske
    Tim Menzies
    Justyna Petke
